data_table.description: Survival File and Follow-up for Cardiovascular Events, Original, Offspring, Generation 3, New Offspring Spouse, Omni 1, and Omni 2 (all cohorts) through 2014. This dataset contains validated endpoints information and should be used in conjunction with the corresponding Sequence of Events file - in this case dataset vr_soe4srv_2014_a_1027s. This dataset includes follow-up time for the following events: CVD, CHD, CHF, Stroke and Stroke/TIA. This dataset replaces vr_survcvd1_2012_a_0870s.

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant identification number.

variable.name: chddate
variable.description: Date of Coronary Heart Disease (CHD) status
variable.comment: This date corresponds to the date the participant had CHD or the date of censoring (last known date the participant did not have CHD). Refer to the protocol for explanation as to how the censoring date was calculated. Date includes month, day and year, however, coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.

variable.name: chfdate
variable.description: Date of Congestive Heart Failure (CHF) status
variable.comment: This date corresponds to the date the participant had CHF or the date of censoring (last known date the participant did not have CHF). Refer to the protocol for explanation as to how the censoring date was calculated. Date includes month, day and year, however, coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.

variable.name: cvddate
variable.comment: This date corresponds to the date the participant had CVD or the date of censoring (last known date the participant did not have CVD). Refer to the protocol for explanation as to how the censoring date was calculated. Date includes month, day and year, however, coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.
